original_text: If you are with someone who is happy, you should also be happy. If you are with someone who is sad, you should also be sad.
korean_text: 즐거워하는 자들과 함께 즐거워하고 우는 자들과 함께 울라

sentences.original_text: If you are with someone who is happy
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 기쁜 사람과 함께 있다면

sentences.original_text: If you are with someone who is sad
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 슬픈 사람과 함께 있다면
